front.title: Use of Multiple Instance of OSPF for the PE/CE protocol in BGP/MPLS VPNs

abstract.t: This document describes a simple way to use OSPF for Provider Edge(PE) router and Customer Edge (CE) router communication in BGP/MPLSVPNs [RFC2547BIS]. [VPN-BGP-OSPF] proposes a complicated way toachieve VPN route propagation as Type-3 LSAs. This documentdescribes the use of multiple instances of OSPF in conjunction withstandard BGP/OSPF route redistribution mechanisms to maintainreachability information throughout VPNs. With this mechanism, VPNroutes are propagated as Type-5 LSAs.
